title: Windbg multiple memory windows
content:
I have tried to open multiple memory windows but I can't.

I tried to find resolution for this on windbg help and on old version it is possible, however on new version I can't find how to open multiple memory windows. Please help me!

comments.text: What version are you attempting this on?
My version is 1.2210.3001.0. And I've found how to do it. Ctrl+Shift+m
If you solved your problem, please post the solution in the answer box for others
